metadata.title: CVE-2021-38016 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in background fetch in Google Chrome priorto 96.0.4664.45 allowed a remote attacker to bypass same origin policy viaa crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
